name: NPR
text: Homes in a New Jersey suburb outside of New York City are selling at 30% over the asking price amid the pandemic, a real estate agent says — describing the frantic, hypercompetitive bidding as a "blood sport." https://t.co/hIXsEdgYbF

name: NPR
text:
Opinion: Researchers have found that some animals  take precautions and keep their distance so they're less likely to be infected by a peer. 

@nprscottsimon wonders why some humans won't do the same. https://t.co/fucYB7WYJT

name: NPR
text:
Can you get the health benefits of exercise without having to, well, exercise?

Scientists think they found a lead.
https://t.co/DautNSBV7A

name: NPR
text:
"Groundhog Day at a wedding" is a piece of shorthand that wouldn't be a lie when it comes to describing "Palm Springs," the new, offbeat romcom starring Andy Samberg, Cristin Milioti, writes critic @lindaholmes.
https://t.co/ljy0CYDD8P

name: NPR
text: Since 2013, photographer Eliot Dudik has been traveling across the country, searching for the American dream on roads named Paradise. https://t.co/I2lGEjXnps https://t.co/PvwSyzjF0E

name: NPR
text:
The White Stripes' 2000 album "De Stijl" is the kind of art you make for yourself, assured few will hear it, writes Lizzy Goodman. It was the last time they'd have that luxury, but they never forgot the lesson.
https://t.co/c81a9FmS9x

name: NPR
text:
Through the stories of LGBTQ youth and the activists working to help them, a new documentary calls attention to the Russian republic of Chechnya's violent abuses against its LGBTQ citizens.  
https://t.co/r90UoeAEHC

name: NPR
text:
The Kenyan government says kids won't go back to school until 2021. Meanwhile, officials are reporting a rise in underage expecting mothers — and surveys have shown few will ever return to school.

"Life has changed completely," a community activist says. 
https://t.co/xF3d0cQjih

name: NPR
text:
Hong Kong schools reopened in May, after being closed since January. 

Things looked promising.

But now a spike in infections in the city has again led to their closure.
https://t.co/0n1IqsPKUq
